Loved the art

The Charminar Means "Four Minarets". constructed in 1951, is a monument and mosque located in Hyderabad  Telangana, India. The landmark has become a global icon of Hyderabad, listed among the most recognized structures of India. Charminar has been a historical place with Mosque on the top floor for over 400 years and also known for its surrounding markets. It is one of the tourist attractions in Hyderabad. It is where many famous Religious festivals are celebrated throughout the year .

Historical monument. They have improved the surrounding slot in recent days. But still it could be improved lot more. It is surrounded by a big market selling various items which is good for shopping for women. But the market also creates a lot of crowd. Food around this place is awesome though.

Charminar is a very great monumental structure is in Hyderabad situated in old city. One can reach Hyderabad by Flight from any metropolitan city and all major cities also. Also it has good connectivity of trains to most of the cities in the country(India). One can travel by bus / by road also from near by distances up to 300km. Charminar is one of the very big constructions in India. Near by Charminar bangles market and Pearls markets are very famous for shopping. Many people from around the globe will purchase something or other in the pearl/bangle market near Charminar due to their specialty.

Famous historical place and google maps are up to date in this location.
Roads are small.. careful while driving.

You can find bangles here and Tea is famous.

Ticket cost is 20 â‚¹ for Indian. 

In a life at least one time you should visit this place..
